titles.title: Preserving Woodworking Traditions and Blocking Government-Mandated Monopolies Act
Preserving Woodworking Traditions and Blocking Government-Mandated Monopolies Act

To prohibit the Consumer Product Safety Commission from issuing a rule related to table saws until 5 years after a patent related to the saws has been dedicate to the public or expired, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Innovation, Data, and Commerce.
